text: Mark Damon (born Alan Harris; April 22, 1933 - May 12, 2024) was an American actor and producer. His best known role was in Roger Corman's House of Usher. Damon died in Los Angeles, California on May 12, 2024, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Foresight Unlimited * From Cowboy to Mogul to Monster: The Neverending Story of Film Pioneer Mark Damon Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Mark Damon
